9c43a1d1663746b7cd2357e03bfede9f6cedf9ec.commitMessage: Issue #4421: Support suppression-xpath element in SuppressionLoader

f244f7f1e2fe49d2fcda9cd5c901d751769f73e8.commitMessage: Issue #4726: fix EqualsUsesNonFinalVariable, HashCodeUsesNonFinalVariable idea violations

7d48c0689c68d1ef30993452abe6de0df09f4fd3.commitMessage: Issue #4396: increase coverage of pitest-checkstyle-filters profile to 100%

ce21086e087661553f3a774c38362327ee88996a.commitMessage: Issue #3763: Try to avoid non-jdk runtime exceptions in code

9586ee86d174ff502b9c57332b29f4b6e88e45ec.commitMessage: Issue #2639: URI is removed from allowed abbreviations

cb5a59fc6baf5de204e3cc99be6ba9865e44350a.commitMessage:
Fix typos in blocks, headers and filters packages. #1555

Fixes some `SpellCheckingInspection` inspection violations.

Description:
>Spellchecker inspection helps locate typos and misspelling in your code, comments and literals.

4fd298b00126d60147dce7631c6e0d3e0921f82f.commitMessage:
Rename ignored catch parameters. #1555

Fixes `UnusedCatchParameter` inspection violations.

Description:
Reports any catch parameters that are unused in their corresponding blocks. This inspection will not report any catch parameters named "ignore" or "ignored". Conversely this inspection will warn on any catch parameters named "ignore" or "ignored" that are actually used.

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

79404974eff1458f4243f8acd6a08b6a8b869342.commitMessage: Integrate patch #1895152, for Avoid Null Equals Comparison Check

35d1673788bbbac8263fdb69275dc6a63b095a24.commitMessage: Making local variables final where possible.

788b41973d5747c7b4699a853b62168cf0001df6.commitMessage:
Changes to make it possible to identify a module by an id, and then to
suppress messages based on the id. The motivation is to allow for finer
grained suppressions. For example, can enable multiple instances of the
Regexp check, and suppress on the individual instance.

e27489c7721909245ea5055eac3b9c7c659081f6.commitMessage: initial replacing RE by Pattern (need to update docs)

433209f256f2f87310b4546cb08218dbdb110556.commitMessage:
A refactoring to remove the circular dependency between the checkstyle and
checkstyle.filters packages. I moved AbstractLoader to the checkstyle.api
package. I moved the SuppressionsLoader to the checkstyle.filters package.

I found the dependencies using the neat Pasta tool which I recommend. It is
available from http://javacentral.compuware.com/pasta/ for free.

21f0b07bd031f022d14106150af66ceddb4c06b8.commitMessage:
Refactor and extend filters to filter chains.
Add suppression filters.
